name: mStream
body:
### What is it?
mStream is a lightweight and easy to use personal music server


### Install
mStream requires nodeJS can be installed through npm

Get your mStream server running in two commands:
```
npm install -g mstream
mstream musicDirectory/
```

This will setup your mStream server to run on port 3000.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
